availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, tavernkeeper. Indiana native. Son of Hiram Steel and Mariah Steel. Married to Laura O'Neil Steel in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on October 1, 1860. Attended school in Hamilton County, Indiana, in 1850. Tavernkeeper in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1860. Tavernkeeper in Louisville in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Indiana, Hamilton County, Noblesville, pp. 104A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 4, p. 32.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film 000482709.
